page.title: 15A Child's View of Thorney
page.content: Living in{Thorney}has many advantages. The school is near and this makes it easy to get there without a bus ride for most people. The{village}is a friendly place with lots of joy. It is a noisy village with much{wildlife flourishing in many places. One disadvantage is that we cannot always buy the things we need, so we have to travel to{Peterborough}which is seven miles away. The village is quite dangerous because of the busy road but people are always careful and accidents are extremely rare. The school is called{The Duke Of Bedford and is near the{A47.}Soon there will be a{by-pass}around the village because there are many old buildings with crumbling foundations. We have our own vicar and also our own doctor and a few shops. We like{Thorney.
